welcome_message_body: Welcome to Schaarbeek, Belgium! This charming city is known for its beautiful Art Nouveau architecture, vibrant markets, and delicious Belgian cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all the wonders this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Snack des Frères
restaurants.description: Snack des Frères is a falafel restaurant located in Schaarbeek.

restaurants.name: 't Potverdoemmeke
restaurants.description: 't Potverdoemmeke is a belgian restaurant located in Schaarbeek.

restaurants.name: Hanedan Pizzeria & Kebap
restaurants.description: Hanedan Pizzeria & Kebap is a kebab restaurant located in Sint-Joost-ten-Node.
restaurants.address: Chausse d'haecht 79 (Rue royal botanique Park), 1210 Sint-Joost-ten-Node

restaurants.name: La Selva
restaurants.description: La Selva is a italian restaurant located in Schaarbeek.

restaurants.name: La Piola Pizza
restaurants.description: La Piola Pizza is a pizzeria located in Sint-Joost-ten-Node.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, designed for passenger comfort and efficiency.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is designated for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
